data.title: First Car Rental branches
data.meta_description: Choose First Car Rental for Eastern Cape car hire. We offer car rental in Port Elizabeth, East London and all surrounding areas.
data.text:
Port Elizabeth Airport

Address:

No.1 De Havilland St, Walmer, Port Elizabeth Airport, Port Elizabeth

Latitude: -33.986111; Longitude: 25.613889

Contact details:

Tel: +27 (0) 41 581 2027

Email: firstpeapt@cmh.co.za

Hours:

Mon to Fri: 06:30 am to 8 pm

Sat: 06:30 am to 7:30 pm

Sun: 06:30 am to 9 pm

Directions:

Follow car rental pick up sign in front of the departures area. Look for the First Car Rental kiosk.

Book a car

Port Elizabeth (downtown)

Address:

No.1 De Havilland St, Walmer, Port Elizabeth

Latitude: -33.983611; Longitude: 25.611111

Contact details:

Tel: +27 (0) 41 581 2027

Email: firstpeapt@cmh.co.za

Hours:

Mon to Fri: 7 am to 6 pm

Sat: 7 am to 6 pm

Sun: 7 am to 6 pm

Directions:

Take Allister Miller Drive into Port Elizabeth Airport. At the second circle, turn left into De Haviland Ave (Engen Garage on the right) and First Car Rental will be the first building on the right.

Book a car

East London Airport

Address:

66 Settlers Way, East London Airport, East London

Latitude: -33.039128; Longitude: 27.829731

Contact details:

Tel: +27 (0) 43 736 2900 or +27 (0) 82 786 6371

Email: firstel@cmh.co.za

Hours:

Mon to Fri: 6 am to 9 pm

Sat: 8 am to 9 pm

Sun: 8 am to 9 pm

Directions:

Proceed out of arrivals hall and straight across the zebra crossing and then turn left into the car rental building. Proceed to your far left and look for First Car Rental signs. Situated 200m from terminal building, shuttle buses are available on every arrival or can be notified by ACSA staff.

Book a car

East London (downtown)

Address:

66 Settlers Way, East London Airport, East London

Latitude: -33.036111; Longitude: 27.823889

Contact details:

Tel: +27 (0) 43 001 0012

Email: firstel@cmh.co.za

Hours:

Mon to Fri: 7 am to 7 pm

Sat: 8 am to 7 pm

Sun: 8 am to 7 pm

Directions:

From the R27, take the airport exit into Settlers Way, which leads you to East London Airport.

Book a car

Mthatha Airport (kiosk)

Address:

Mthatha Airport, R61 Ngcobo Road, Mthatha

Latitude: -31.547903; Longitude: 28.674289

Contact details:

Tel: +27 (0) 47 536 0010

Email: firstmthatha@cmh.co.za

Hours:

Mon to Fri: 7 am to 6 pm

Sat: 8 am to 12 pm

Sun: 1 pm to 6 pm

Directions:

The First Car Rental kiosk is situated to your left once you have exited the baggage claim area.

Book a car
